name: Niemiec v. Holliday et ux., Appellants

judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Niemiec v. Holliday et ux., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; costs on appellants.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Samuel L. Rodgers, with him Rodgers and Roney, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Niemiec v. Holliday et ux., Appellants.
Argued September 30, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Sanford S. Finder, for appellants.
Samuel L. Rodgers, with him Rodgers and Roney, for appellees.
March 20, 1972:
